main event: Two USN pilots reported observing an unidentified flying object in Memphis, Tennessee on April 1, 1952.
interesting points: The object was tracked from 6 miles east of Shelbyville to 18 miles southwest of Nashville.,Estimated size of the object was 30-40 feet in diameter.,It was described as circular with a whitish-orange glow.,Pilots noted the object exhibited varying altitude and speed.,Weather conditions reported visibility of 1/2 to 1 mile at the time of sighting.
